name: Bones 'n Riddles
description:
Bones 'n Riddles is a little dungeon crawler where you have to fight off skeletons and solve puzzles to get to the final boss. Only truly skilled knights can defeat him... Oh, and be careful of the fire pits and arrow traps!

Bones 'n Riddles is my own game that I developed as a final project for my training. It's also my very first finished game.

I had about 4 months to complete it. From the idea to modeling, texturing, animating, programming and creating the special effects, I did everything myself. It was chosen by the instructors as the best final project and I'm very proud of it.

Tip: Stand still and wait until the skeleton walks to you to attack.
